706301f-a.text:
Plymouth Street, west from Adams Street, under the Manhattan Bridge, to the Brooklyn Bridge.
November 1, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
706301f-a.folder: Plymouth Street & Adams Street, Brooklyn, NY

702991f-a.text:
Anchorage Place (Beyond fence, cars thereon) between Plymouth Street (left) and Water Street (right). The 6 story building at the right houses the L.and H.Stern Co. At the right is a partial view of the Manhattan Bridge Tower.
April 4, 1938.

P.L. Sperr
702991f-a.folder: Anchorage Place & Plymouth Street, Brooklyn, NY
